chinese: 谢谢你, Wendy.
english: Thank you, Wendy.

chinese: 对, 我们这一年经营得很好.
english: Yes, we've had a very good year.

chinese: 我们设法控制了成本, 正如您所看到的那样.
english: We've managed to control our costs, as you can see.

chinese: 成本实际下降了7%.
english: They're actually down 7%.

chinese: 干得不错, 不过这是你们应该做到的.
english: Not bad. But of course you're expected to do that.

chinese: 我们也改变了广告的方式.
english: And we've changed our advertising.

chinese: 我们认为这促进了新的业务.
english: We think that's helped new business.

chinese: 从去年1月开始,新业务增长了10%.
english: New business has grown 10% since last January.

chinese: 干得不错.
english: Not bad.

chinese: 考虑到这个行业目前的状况, 我冒昧说一句, 这已经很好了.
english: With the industry in its current state, I venture to say it's quite good.

chinese: 先生. 您的水.
english: Here's your water, sir.

chinese: 我对这种常规报告不感兴趣, Anne.
english: I'm not interestecd in the standard report, Anne.

chinese: 我自己可以读.
english: I can read.

chinese: 那当然.
english: By all means.

chinese: 还有什么别的问题需要我解答吗?
english: Is there anything else I can answer for you then?

chinese: 我听说了那些项目, Anne.
english: I've heard about the programs, Anne.

chinese: 雇员小组和营销.
english: Employee groups, the marketing.

chinese: 我想知道是谁在负责.
english: And I want to know who's responsible.

chinese: 我明白了.
english: I see.

chinese: 你要知道,我们还有许多其他的饭店.
english: We have many other hotels, you know.

chinese: 我希望他们全部都能做得像这家一样好.
english: And I want them all to do as well as this one.
